TextBody:
Hello Corvin,
 
Thank you for contacting Netwrix Technical Support.  
 
To help us streamline the troubleshooting process and resolve your issue more efficiently, please provide the following information:   
 
What is the impact of the issue on your business?  
Who is affected by this issue?  
What steps to troubleshoot the issue have already been taken?  
What are you trying to do or accomplish?  
Is this a new configuration, data collection, or report?  
  If no, has anything changed in your environment since the last time it worked?  
When did this issue start?   
What are the steps to reproduce?  

To assist you more effectively, we kindly ask for the following information: 

	For a scan issue: Please provide the log files generated during the scan. 



	For a WebApp issue: We’ll need screenshots of the full error message, along with any related event log errors. 


Place these files into an archive and upload it via customer portal in 'My Tickets' section: https://www.netwrix.com/tickets.html 

Once we receive these details, we’ll be able to analyze the situation further and provide a more accurate resolution. 

Looking forward to your response. 


Thank you,

Rej Uddin

Technical Support Team Lead

Phone: 1-949-407-5125 | Toll-free: 888-638-9749

____________________ __________

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NLZgh:ref

Hello Rej,

again, can we skip the default Level1 Helpdesk questionnaire in the future and focus on my question?

What is the impact of the issue on your business?
=> Makes us think if PingCastle Enterprise is still the right tool for us.
Who is affected by this issue?
=> Everyone using PingCastle any version
What steps to troubleshoot the issue have already been taken?
=> We opened THIS ticket
What are you trying to do or accomplish?
=> Getting a qualified answer
Is this a new configuration, data collection, or report?
=> The Configuration is provided by NetWrix / Pingcastle
  If no, has anything changed in your environment since the last time it worked?
When did this issue start?
=> I guess since ever
What are the steps to reproduce?
=> Have an AD supporting NTLMv1 (Default Config), Run PingCastle, View the Report.


Best Regards,
Corvin
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #440028 - Rule for "LMCompatibilityLevel LM & NTLM"

TextBody:
Hello Corvin,

Apologies for the delay. After consulting with the PingCastle team,they are considering adding action plans to unify the views however this will be available in future updates.

Regarding Rule Logic Modification, this is not something the team are actively pursuing at the moment however it can be added to the future plans of PingCastle.

FYI, there is so specific timeline for these plans. The team are very thankful for all the things you have pointed out.

Thank you,

Rej Uddin

Technical Support Team Lead

Phone: 1-949-407-5125 | Toll-free: 888-638-9749
